overview: National Liquidators is the leading vessel recovery and remarketing firm in the nation. We have been the preferred choice of lenders, maritime attorneys and insurance companies since 1988. We also seize, transport and auction boats, yachts and other vessels, as well as aircraft, for the Departments of Justice and Homeland Security, including the D.E.A., F.B.I., I.C.E., Border Patrol and the U.S. Marshals’ Service. National has handled over 21,000 cases from runabouts to mega yachts, passenger cruise liners to cargo vessels. This record of success is the result of National’s professionalism, experience and knowledge of the industry.
